instructions:
Pat liver dry, shake on Season-All, dust with seasoned flour and refrigerate for an hour. Fry bacon and
keep warm. Sauté onions in 2 tbsp bacon drippings in a partially covered frying pan at low/warm for about
30 minutes or until glassy and light brown. Heat may have to be reduced during last 5 or 10 minutes to avoid
burning.
Fry liver in bacon drippings over low/medium heat, 2 minutes on 1st side and 1 1/2 minutes on 2nd side
for 1/4 inch slices. For thinner slices, reduce time. It should be pink in the center. Do not overcook. Serves
4.
ingredients: 4 large onions, halved and sliced 1/4 inch
name: Calves Liver And Onions
